message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses the use of Search-Term-Recommendation (STR) systems to improve retrieval performance in Query Expansion (QE) for information needs. This topic is closely related to Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Natural Language Processing (cs.CL), Deep Learning (cs.DL), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Machine Learning (cs.LG). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper.
